attributes.action: Grant the English people a referendum to create an English Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When is the Government going to listen. We should have an English Parliament, Scotland has one and so does Wales; so why not England? It is about time they stopped giving Scotland a say on our affairs yet we can't influence their legislation. There is massive demand for it by the English population and the Government still refuses to listen to the majority

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
